title: testforblock
description: Tests whether a certain block is in a specific location.

fields.title: position
fields.description: Required. A `vector` of the location the block to test.

fields.title: tileName
fields.description: Required. An `enum` of the block to test for.

fields.title: blockStates
fields.description: Optional. The `block states` to match when testing.

overloads.title: Test for block, optional block state
overloads.description: Test for a `block name` in a `vector` position with optional `block states`.
